original_text: On the twenty-third day of the seventh month he sent the people away to their homes, joyful and glad of heart for the prosperity that the Lord had granted to David and to Solomon and to Israel his people.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 제이십삼일에 왕이 백성을 그들의 장막으로 돌려보내매 백성이 여호와께서 다윗과 솔로몬과 그의 백성 이스라엘에게 베푸신 은혜로 말미암아 기뻐하며 마음에 즐거워하였더라

sentences.original_text: On the twenty-third day of the seventh month
he sent the people away to their homes
for the prosperity that the Lord had granted
to David and to Solomon and to Israel his people
